title: Surviving the Cut
resume: Surviving the Cut was a military documentary/reality television series produced by 2 Roosters Media for the Discovery Channel. It portrays the rigorous training programs of various elite forces of the United States armed forces. Season two premiered on the Discovery Channel on July 11, 2011 and ended on August 26, 2011.
